unparsed_output:
To find the maximum value at the x-axis of both plots, we need to identify the highest point on the x-axis of each graph.

In the first plot, the x-axis represents the "Tar" yield from medium cartridges. The highest point on the x-axis is approximately at 726 puffs.

In the second plot, the x-axis represents the "Nicotine" yield from medium cartridges. The highest point on the x-axis is also approximately at 726 puffs.

Therefore, the maximum value at the x-axis of both plots is 726 puffs.
